title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 401.6 - Publication of final comprehensive annual social services program plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 401.6 - Publication of final comprehensive annual social services program plan

State Regulations
(a) The final
comprehensive annual social services program plan will be submitted to the
commissioner of the department so that it may be approved and published by the
commissioner at least 45 days following publication of the proposed
comprehensive annual social services program plan and prior to commencement of
the program year. (b) The
department will provide copies of the final comprehensive annual social
services program plan to the social services district prior to publication of
the final plan by the commissioner. Beginning on the date of publication of the
final plan by the commissioner and continuing throughout the program year, the
department and the social services district shall make copies of the final
comprehensive annual social services program plan available for inspection by
the public. The department will also make copies of the final comprehensive
annual social services program plan available for purchase at a price related
to cost of printing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
401.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
